arts.ttl: Marseille miss chance to go top in France after draw with bottom club Angers
arts.sum: Marseille missed a chance to join Monaco and Paris Saint-Germain at the top of the French league when it could only draw with bottom club Angers 1-1 in a match marred by first-half red cards for both teams on Friday. The full back was originally shown a yellow card but the referee changed it to red after reviewing the foul on VAR.

arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille’s form has fluctuated so far this season. They began the season in style, battering Stade Brestois 5-1 away on the opening day. However, they were more wasteful…

arts.ttl: Marseille blast league’s decision to suspend sporting advisor
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille have criticised the Ligue de Football Professionnel’s (LFP) decision to ban their sporting advisor, Medhi Benatia, for three games The sporting advisor was banned for his comments…

arts.ttl: Why Ruud van Nistelrooy's position at Man United is raising eyebrows. Plus, player anger at Crystal Palace and the latest on Mason Greenwood: THE SAMI MOKBEL COLUMN
arts.sum: SAMI MOKBEL: Goals - lots of them - for the club. Revered by supporters. An undeniable connection to the club's glorious past. Van Nistelrooy's return has certainly got tongues wagging.
